tool_description: Calculates semantic similarity scores between query embeddings and content embeddings using various distance metrics.

query_embedding.description: Vector embedding of the search query

content_embeddings.description: Vector embeddings of knowledge base content

similarity_metric.description: Similarity metric to use: cosine, euclidean, or dot_product

normalize_scores.description: Whether to normalize similarity scores to 0-1 range

error_messages: Embedding dimension mismatch error: Query and content embeddings must have the same dimensionality.
Invalid similarity metric error: Metric must be one of: cosine, euclidean, dot_product.
Empty embeddings error: Content embeddings array cannot be empty.
Threshold out of range error: Threshold must be between 0 and 1.
Invalid embedding format error: Embeddings must be numeric arrays.
usage: Provide query embedding and array of content embeddings. Specify similarity metric, threshold, and normalization preferences. Returns similarity scores for each content item.

similarity_scores.description: Similarity scores for each content embedding

top_matches.description: Indices of content items sorted by similarity score

average_similarity.description: Average similarity score across all content items
